remarks: Conjunction in antecedent versus disjunction in consequent, for a decidable proposition.  Theorem *5.6 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 125, with decidability condition added.  The reverse implication holds for all propositions (see ~ pm5.6r ).  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 2-Apr-2018.)
statement: pm5.6dc $p |- ( DECID ps -> ( ( ( ph /\ -. ps ) -> ch ) <-> ( ph -> ( ps \/ ch ) ) ) ) $.
